column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Happy Canada Day! Everybody remember to… Canada today. I guess. Maybe light some fireworks and then immediately apologize. Sorry “apologise.” Oh wait. I just looked it up. They do spell it with a z. Or rather a zed. Well look at that! We’re right back where we started! My apologiez! Anyways so Greg Dworkin will be here eh? I should’ve mentioned that first. Soory. Umm well maple syrup everybody. Hockey. Over and oot. Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
